articles.title: Bitcoin record biggest plunge since February, Ether also plummets - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Several online reports attributed the plunge to speculation the US Treasury may crack down on money laundering that’s carried out through digital assets.
articles.content:
Bitcoin plunged the most in more than seven weeks, just days after reaching a record.
The biggest crypto coin fell 8.5% to $55,810.32 as of 2:52 p.m. in Singapore on Sunday, after declining as much … [+2426 chars]

articles.title: Flavoured milk taxable at 12% under GST: AAR rules in Amul dairy case - Economic Times
articles.description: Earlier the Karnataka AAR, in an application of Karnataka Cooperative Milk Producers Federation, had ruled that flavoured milk is taxable at 5 per cent.
